credential_name.description: Name of credentials from this pack's configuration to use, which includes hostname and api creds.

group_ids.description: The ids of the groups this incident will belong to.

incident_fields.description: Dictionary of Incident Fields to set values for Example: {"actors": "Internal", "vmName": "labimage001"}

incident_subtype_name.description: Incident Subtype Name Example: Inbound Phishing

owner_id.description: The id of the user that will own this incident

simple_response.description: True to only return incident num; False to return entire json
